  /**
   * Helper function to calculate an object's priority (H-value).
   *
   * The priority is computed as:
   *   pri = L + (freq * 2.0e5 / size) + recency_boost
   * where L is the last evicted priority, freq is usage count,
   * and recency_boost makes very recent objects slightly less likely to be evicted.
   * 
   * This rewards recency more directly, aiding hot set adaptation.
   * Increase freq/size scaling to protect both frequently accessed and small objects.
   */
  double calculate_priority(uint64_t freq, uint64_t size) {
    const double recency_boost = 0.13 * (request_counter % 6); // recency bonus in [0, 0.65]
    if (size == 0) {
      return pri_last_evict + (double)(freq) * 2.0e5 + recency_boost;
    }
    return pri_last_evict + (double)(freq) * 2.0e5 / size + recency_boost;
  }
=======
  /**
   * Helper function to calculate an object's priority (H-value).
   *
   * The priority is computed as:
   *   pri = L + (freq * 1.1e5 / (sqrt(size)+8)) + recency_boost
   * where L is the last evicted priority, freq is usage count,
   * and recency_boost makes very recent objects slightly less likely to be evicted.
   *
   * Use sqrt(size)+8 for gentler size penalty, improving tiny/medium miss ratio.
   * Recency boost now rewards very recent objects slightly more strongly.
   */
  double calculate_priority(uint64_t freq, uint64_t size) {
    const double recency_boost = 0.16 * (request_counter % 6); // recency bonus in [0, 0.8]
    if (size == 0) {
      return pri_last_evict + (double)(freq) * 1.1e5 + recency_boost;
    }
    return pri_last_evict + (double)(freq) * 1.1e5 / (std::sqrt((double)size) + 8.0) + recency_boost;
  }

    // Revised initial frequency: 2 for tiny, 3 for huge, 2 for large, 1 for other
    if (obj_size < 4096) {
      new_obj.frequency = 2;
    } else if (obj_size > 2 * 1024 * 1024) { // >2MB gets biggest boost
      new_obj.frequency = 3;
    } else if (obj_size > 256 * 1024) { // 256KB-2MB gets moderate boost
      new_obj.frequency = 2;
    } else {
      new_obj.frequency = 1;
    }

    double pri = calculate_priority(new_obj.frequency, new_obj.size) + 0.05 * (request_counter % 4);

    PQNode new_node(pri, ++request_counter, obj_id);
    auto [set_iter, inserted] = priority_queue.insert(new_node);

    new_obj.pq_iterator = set_iter;
    cache_objects[obj_id] = new_obj;
